name: Pocket War 2K
description:
Pocket war 2K is an overview shooting game in which the main player leads an army against the Karrate aliens.

Strategize and plan with an army that can be commanded to attack, defend or follow.

Reinforcement is on the way! you will gain more help by collecting the eagle emblems appearing before every level or randomly emerging during the game:

Yellow for troops

Brown for tanks

Blue for air support

You will die in one hit, and re-spawn, IF you have any troops left on the field.

Play smart, commend your units in a strategic view to pass all 9 challenging levels.  

Attention! The game is in trail run.

suggestions and responses to Xcompanygames@gmail.com

the more downloads – the more upgrades you’ll get (graphics and technical).

There’s a lot in store for this amazing old school game, so be a friend and support it.
